edu.thu.keg.mdap

Interface DataSetManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataSetManagerImpl

    public interface DataSetManager
    This object provides information about all datasets stored in the platform, including all suppliers. Metadata stored in all data providers are found here.
    Author:
    Yuanchao Ma

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataSet createDataSet(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, DataProvider provider, DataField[] fields, boolean loadable)
      Create a new DataSet instance, using the given name, connection string and data field set.
      DataSet getDataSet(java.lang.String name)
      Get a dataset stored in the platform and return a reference.
      java.util.Collection<DataSet> getDataSetList()
      Get all datasets stored in the platform
      java.util.Collection<DataSet> getDataSetList(java.lang.Class<? extends DataSetFeature> feature)
      Get all datasets that supports the certain type of feature
      void removeDataSet(DataSet ds)
      Remove a DataSet from the platform, as well as remove its actual data from its provider.
      void storeDataSet(DataSet ds)
      Store(register) metadata of the DataSet into the platform

    • Method Detail

      • getDataSet

        DataSet getDataSet(java.lang.String name)
        Get a dataset stored in the platform and return a reference. It can be stored in all registered providers.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the requested dataset
        Returns:
        a reference of DataSet

      • getDataSetList

        java.util.Collection<DataSet> getDataSetList()
        Get all datasets stored in the platform
        Returns:
        a array containing all the dataset references

      • storeDataSet

        void storeDataSet(DataSet ds)
        Store(register) metadata of the DataSet into the platform
        Parameters:
        ds - The DataSet object to be stored.

      • createDataSet

        DataSet createDataSet(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String description,
                    DataProvider provider,
                    DataField[] fields,
                    boolean loadable)
        Create a new DataSet instance, using the given name, connection string and data field set.
        Parameters:
        name - The unique name of the DataSet
        provider - its DataProvider
        fields - DataField set
        Returns:
        A new DataSet instance

      • removeDataSet

        void removeDataSet(DataSet ds)
                   throws DataProviderException
        Remove a DataSet from the platform, as well as remove its actual data from its provider. No operation is performed if the DataSet does not exist.
        Parameters:
        ds - The DataSet to be removed
        Throws:
        DataProviderException - when removing DataSet actual data throws error

      • getDataSetList

        java.util.Collection<DataSet> getDataSetList(java.lang.Class<? extends DataSetFeature> feature)
        Get all datasets that supports the certain type of feature
        Parameters:
        feature - A Class instance that represents the demanded feature type
        Returns:
        A collection of DataSet's
